## DecoratorFactory.getNumberOfParameters() method

Get the number of parameters for a given constructor or method

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static getNumberOfParameters(target: Object, member?: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  target | <code>Object</code> | Class or the prototype |
|  member | <code>string</code> | Method name |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
